feed.title: Move authorative source for BIPs to git repository

entry.title: Move authorative source for BIPs to git repository
entry.summary: In this email thread, Gavin Andresen suggests replacing BIPs on the wiki with links to GitHub documents. He then asks Wladimir or Gregory to update BIP 0001 to include the proper process for creating and editing a BIP, as it currently does not mention the GitHub repo at all. It is unclear what the overall context of this conversation is, but it seems to be related to the development and management of Bitcoin Improvement Proposals (BIPs).
